title: Seattle City Council Sustainability & Transportation Committee: 9/7/2018
description:
Agenda: Chair's Report; Public Comment; Appointments and Reappointments; Sugary Beverage Tax (SBT) Community Advisory Board (CAB) Briefing; Food Access Pilot Statement of Legislative Intent (SLI) Response; CB 119329: Ordinance relating to commuter benefits and employment in Seattle; Res 31835:  Resolution relating to utility lines near South Holgate Street in SoDo; Res 31834: Relating to City of Seattle's opposition to offshore oil and gas drilling and exploration activities, including seismic airgun blasting.
